title: Discover South Australia's Fleurieu Peninsula with a Top-Rated Stay
description: The delights of Strathalbyn and the Fleurieu Peninsula await at the Strath Motel, one of the areaâ€™s highest-rated properties. Boasting five stars on TripAdvisor, the motel places guests within easy driving distance of Adelaide Hills, Murraylands and the wine regions of Langhorne Creek and McLaren Vale. Included is daily breakfast with plunger coffee and a bottle of wine on arrival.
